column1: #Text=" Asami says : " You know , nobody expects you to bounce back right away .
#Text=I want you to know that I 'm here for you .
#Text=If you ever want to talk , or , anything .
#Text=But let 's just try to enjoy this today ; for Jinora .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " You look beautiful , sweetie .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You 're looking stronger everyday , Korra .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I 'd like to officially welcome you back to Republic City .
#Text=I know that the last time we saw each other , it did n't end on the best terms .
#Text=But I want to thank you for taking down those Red Lotus terrorists .
#Text=" Asami says : " We should go inside .
#Text=" Ikki says : " I - I can help .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I want to ride with Korra .
#Text=" Raiko says : " She 's not looking good .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Neither would you if you 'd gone through what she had .

#Text=I 'm just saying , with the Earth Kingdom in complete disarray since the loss of the Queen ... " Zuko says : " And even with Zaheer locked up again , we still do n't know how many Red Lotus members might be out there , hiding .
#Text=With the world getting more and more dangerous , we need the Avatar now more than ever .
#Text=Who will protect us while she 's in a wheelchair ?
